caption.p: Response of cortical microtubule in etiolated seedlings of A thaliana expressing GFP-TuB6 to 50 Âµl of oil extracted from A rugosa (C, D), or menthone/isomenthone (F, H) as compared to controls treated with water (A, C, E, G) either in epidermal cells of the cotyledon (A, B, E, F) or the hypocotyl (C, D, G, H).
